title: Lenox Butterfly Meadow Soup Bowl Set of 4
description: The classic design decorates and shapes the Butterfly Meadow Soup Bowl with a gently scalloped rim and lively garden illustration. A pleasant complement to one's Butterfly Meadow Collection, this durable ceramic porcelain piece is ideal for snacks, and is microwave and dishwasher-safe.
